item.title: Secure Data: Robocopy Backup and Restore Guide
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "Data Management" , "Backup Strategies" , "Data Protection" , "Windows Tools" , "File Copying" , "Data Backup" , "Disaster Recovery" , "File Restore" , "Command-Line Tools"
item.description: Learn how to securely back up and restore files using Robocopy, a powerful tool for data protection and peace of mind.

item.title: Assume Every Device Is Already Compromised: Strengthening Digital Security in an Interconnected World
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Personal Data Protection" , "Strong Authentication and Password Practices" , "Social Media Privacy" , "Secure Communication" , "Device Hygiene" , "Data Backup" , "Cybersecurity Best Practices" , "Digital Privacy" , "Online Security Tips" , "Protecting Sensitive Information"
item.description: Discover why it's crucial to assume every device is already compromised and learn practical measures to enhance your digital security in today's interconnected world.
